Consumer Watchdog looks forward to engaging with Page as he assumes his new role and discussing consumer issues like protecting consumers' online privacy.

LONDON( AFP)- Prime Minister David Cameron has been damaged by his media chief's resignation over phone-hacking at a tabloid newspaper he headed and the row is unlikely to go away, commentators said Saturday. So far, our worst day in government, a senior aide from David Cameron 's Downing Street office told The Guardian, after Andy Coulson quit as chief of communications on Friday.
